Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
